display_long_description:
Demo of "ZOSU Zoo"
This is a sample of ZOSU Zoo, demo contents:
- ZOSU Zoo Land with a fence to restrict where you can go (no fence in full)
- Mixed reality and hand tracking preview area with sea turtles, and some plants and animals
- ZOSU Ocean area lobby
- 360 degree background video background beach area with toy sized animals

The full game has 140+ animals and over 60 jungle plants in various mixed reality and hand tracking experiences with mixed reality visual boundaries and save state options in some areas, 30 ocean areas with a water jetpack, and 3 areas with 360 beach videos with toy sized animals or ocean creatures in each.

Major Updates:
- February 2025: added 360 beach video background area with toy sized animals into the demo, and updated zoo main area based on latest main game updates
- July 2024: add mixedreality + handtracking and ocean areas, with Quest1 being restricted to the original build only with the classic ZOSU Zoo Land.
